RECOMMENDER_ONE_SUB_BRANCH = #{recommenderOneSubBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_GREEN_BY_PUR = #{isGreenByPur,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_GREEN_BY_KIND = #{isGreenByKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_GREEN_BY_MID_KIND = #{isGreenByMidKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_GREEN_BY_SUB_KIND = #{isGreenBySubKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BILL_NO = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select org_name from TB_LOAN_RECEIPT where org_name like CONCAT ('%',CONCAT (#{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
mapper.insert:
MERGE INTO TB_LOAN_RECEIPT t1 USING (
select #{item.no} as no #{item.custName} as custName #{item.custCode} as custCode #{item.orgModel} as orgModel #{item.financingModel} as financingModel #{item.declareModel} as declareModel #{item.syndicationType} as syndicationType #{item.creditKind} as creditKind #{item.currbusModel} as currbusModel #{item.oldbuModel} as oldbuModel #{item.contAmount} as contAmount #{item.isSecurityRoom} as isSecurityRoom #{item.securityRoomType} as securityRoomType #{item.creditSubLoanKind} as creditSubLoanKind #{item.systemContractNo} as systemContractNo #{item.paperContractNo} as paperContractNo #{item.billNo} as billNo #{item.currency} as currency #{item.billAmout} as billAmout #{item.billLength} as billLength #{item.billUnit} as billUnit #{item.billBeginDate} as billBeginDate #{item.billEndDate} as billEndDate #{item.billBlance} as billBlance #{item.isEntrustedPayment} as isEntrustedPayment #{item.interestRate} as interestRate #{item.interestRateType} as interestRateType #{item.baseinterestRateType} as baseinterestRateType #{item.interestRateGrade} as interestRateGrade #{item.interestRateFloatingType} as interestRateFloatingType #{item.floatingRateInterestRate} as floatingRateInterestRate #{item.floatingValueInterestRate} as floatingValueInterestRate #{item.rateAdjustMethod} as rateAdjustMethod #{item.repaymentMethod} as repaymentMethod #{item.interestPaymentMethod} as interestPaymentMethod #{item.dailyRateCalMethod} as dailyRateCalMethod #{item.cleardate} as cleardate #{item.promissoryStatus} as promissoryStatus #{item.orgName} as orgName, #{item.emplName} as emplName, #{item.industryCategory} as industryCategory, #{item.industryLargeCategory} as industryLargeCategory, #{item.industryMiddleCategory} as industryMiddleCategory, #{item.industrySmallCategory} as industrySmallCategory, #{item.mltenterpriseScale} as mltenterpriseScale, #{item.isTechnologyCompany} as isTechnologyCompany, #{item.headingCategory} as headingCategory, #{item.generalCategory} as generalCategory, #{item.middleCategory} as middleCategory, #{item.subclassCategory} as subclassCategory, #{item.subjectRating} as subjectRating, #{item.debtRating} as debtRating, #{item.riskClassification} as riskClassification, #{item.greenCreditMark} as greenCreditMark, #{item.greenCreditMarkType} as greenCreditMarkType, #{item.isEnvironmentalSafetyRisk} as isEnvironmentalSafetyRisk, #{item.riskResult} as riskResult, #{item.socialRisksResult} as socialRisksResult, #{item.isPppprojectCompany} as isPppprojectCompany, #{item.operationType} as operationType, #{item.isWhetherExtend} as isWhetherExtend, #{item.agricultural} as agricultural, #{item.sign} as sign, #{item.ruralProjectsSign} as ruralProjectsSign, #{item.holdingType} as holdingType, #{item.customerType} as customerType, #{item.groupInformation} as groupInformation, #{item.tierOneBranch} as tierOneBranch, #{item.tierTwoBranch} as tierTwoBranch, #{item.isReferralsCustomer} as isReferralsCustomer, #{item.isMarketCustSubBranch} as isMarketCustSubBranch, #{item.stockCustomerNo} as stockCustomerNo, #{item.stockCustomerName} as stockCustomerName, #{item.marketingOrganization} as marketingOrganization, #{item.subBranchOrgName} as subBranchOrgName, #{item.countryRegionOfBusiness} as countryRegionOfBusiness, #{item.isCompanyReferrals} as isCompanyReferrals, #{item.recommenderName} as recommenderName, #{item.recommenderNumber} as recommenderNumber, #{item.recommenderOneBranch} as recommenderOneBranch, #{item.recommenderTwoBranch} as recommenderTwoBranch, #{item.recommenderOneSubBranch} as recommenderOneSubBranch, #{item.isGreenByPur} as isGreenByPur, #{item.isGreenByKind} as isGreenByKind, #{item.isGreenByMidKind} as isGreenByMidKind, #{item.isGreenBySubKind} as isGreenBySubKind from dual
) t2 ON (t1.BILL_NO = t2.billNo) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE
t1.NO = t2.no,
t1.CUST_NAME = t2.custName,
t1.CUST_CODE = t2.custCode,
t1.ORG_MODEL = t2.orgModel,
t1.FINANCING_MODEL = t2.financingModel,
t1.DECLARE_MODEL = t2.declareModel,
t1.SYNDICATION_TYPE = t2.syndicationType,
t1.CREDIT_KIND = t2.creditKind,
t1.CURRBUS_MODEL = t2.currbusModel,
t1.OLDBU_MODEL = t2.oldbuModel,
t1.CONT_AMOUNT = t2.contAmount,
t1.IS_SECURITY_ROOM = t2.isSecurityRoom,
t1.SECURITY_ROOM_TYPE = t2.securityRoomType,
t1.CREDIT_SUB_LOAN_KIND = t2.creditSubLoanKind,
t1.SYSTEM_CONTRACT_NO = t2.systemContractNo,
t1.PAPER_CONTRACT_NO = t2.paperContractNo,
t1.CURRENCY = t2.currency,
t1.BILL_AMOUT = t2.billAmout,

t1.IS_MARKET_CUST_SUB_BRANCH = t2.isMarketCustSubBranch,
t1.STOCK_CUSTOMER_NO = t2.stockCustomerNo,
t1.STOCK_CUSTOMER_NAME = t2.stockCustomerName,
t1.MARKETING_ORGANIZATION = t2.marketingOrganization,

t1.IS_GREEN_BY_SUB_KIND = t2.isGreenBySubKind,
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT
